name: Feature Request
about: Suggest a new component or feature
title: '[FEAT] '
labels: 'enhancement'
---

## Component/Feature

What component or feature would you like to add?

## Use Case

What problem does this solve? When would someone use this?

## Example

Do you have a mockup or code example?

```tsx
// Example usage
<Terminal>
  <YourComponent />
</Terminal>
```

## Additional Context

Any other info, screenshots, or links?
